name: Wuggy Poppy Dancing Ball
description:
Enjoy Wuggy Poppy Dancing Ball Music

Let's dance hard with colorful balls under the majestic sky and roll challenging like solving puzzle games in space galaxy

It's a galaxy Adventure to unlock new songs in the music box

creates a very engaging experience for anyone who Wuggy Poppy music.

Feature:
1. Original background music according to the theme in this game
2. Very simple and easy workout mode with hold, drag & drag controls.
3. Various difficulty levels are very challenging and improve our concentration
4. High quality and various music genres to suit all musical tastes.
Let's roll the ball and feel the Color Matching game in this game!
